summary: SummaryNARS Explicit Lipstick is a high-end dimensional satin lipstick that delivers long-lasting comfort with vibrant, pure-color payoff and creamy, smudge-resistant wear. Precision-tip bullet defines and contours for sculpted sophistication and lightweight, medium-to-full coverage.
details: DetailsBenefitsLong-lasting comfortPure-color payoffSmudge-resistant wearDimensional satin finishLightweight, medium-to-full coveragePrecision-tip bullet helps effortlessly define, contour, and sculpt lipsKey IngredientsRosehip Seed Oil: smoothingHyaluronic Acid: locks in moistureColor Sculpt Technology: Instantly releases intense, form-fitting color for lips that look sculpted and dimensionalFormulated WithoutTalc, Alcohol, Parabens, Phthalates, Mineral Oil, SulfatesItem 2628203How To UseUse the tip of the lipstick to hug the shape of the lip line and fill top lip.Press lips together to transfer excess color to the bottom lip.Perfect and fill the bottom lip.Swipe on an additional one to two layers to intensify color for desired opacity.IngredientsDiisostearyl Malate, Polyethylene, Diphenylsiloxy Phenyl Trimethicone, Octyldodecanol, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Trimethyl Pentaphenyl Trisiloxane, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Ethylhexyl Olivate, Dimethicone, Mica, Sorbitan Sesquiisostearate, Bis-Behenyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleate, Hydroxyapatite, Tocopherol, Squalane, Lauroyl Lysine, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Glyceryl Behenate, Calcium Stearate, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Trihydroxystearin, Glucomannan, Phenoxyethanol, [+/-(May Contain/Peut Contenir): Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985)].Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use the tip of the lipstick to hug the shape of the lip line and fill top lip.Press lips together to transfer excess color to the bottom lip.Perfect and fill the bottom lip.Swipe on an additional one to two layers to intensify color for desired opacity.

reviews.headline: I would not,absolutely not.
reviews.comments: Color was not true will be returning it for sure.

reviews.headline: My new fave lipstick
reviews.comments: I have been looking for a perfect dark shade of red and I finally found it! This lipstick goes on like butter and the shade is the perfect shade of crimson red I've been looking for! This is my second Explicit lipstick and I'm obsessed with this line of lipsticks!

reviews.headline: My new fave lipstick
reviews.comments: I have been looking for a perfect dark shade of red and I finally found it! This lipstick goes on like butter and the shade is the perfect shade of crimson red I've been looking for! This is my second Explicit lipstick and I'm obsessed with this line of lipsticks!

reviews.headline: Perfect formula
reviews.comments: This lipstick formula is so creamy and comfortable on the lips. Seriously you'd think you were just wearing a simple lip balm its so soft. I have the color unrestrained and it is gorgeous. Its very pigmented though and if you have fair skin like I do be aware its a bold look. But hey, I like bold.

reviews.headline: Beautiful shades and texture!
reviews.comments: I love the shades of these lipsticks and the feel of them. The packaging is top notch too. Only downfall is the price but its worth picking up at least one!

reviews.headline: Yes I will buy again
reviews.comments: Beautiful color makes my teeth look whiter

reviews.headline: Lipstick broke
reviews.comments: I've had this lipstick for about two weeks and it broke today when I applied it. This never happens with me with any lipstick so this was disappointing considering the cost.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again!!!!
reviews.comments: Love how it stays on so long!  Perfect !!!!!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: I love the color and that it doesn't feel drying. As far as the stay on power, it doesn't really have one. Not sure why some people say it even stays through eating and drinking. I don't eat anything and it still disappears.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: I had trouble with dry lips and lipstick cracking. I thought the expensive brands were just to be a show off but I after wearing this lipstick once it is quality lipstick. My lips were smooth and moist all day, no cracks or peeling.

reviews.headline: Love the color and the magnetic tube but‚Ä¶..
Hard to Work With
reviews.comments: This was hard to work with - it was hard to get it inside the lines of my lips and was prone to smuding. Beautiful colors, but not worth the price. Will be returning.

reviews.headline: I use this lipstick everyday.
reviews.comments: Lipstick is creamy and glides on easily. Stays put for better part of the day.

reviews.headline: So good!
reviews.comments: These lipsticks are GREAT for dry lips. Very comfortable and doesnt drift from where it's applied. I have the shade "unauthorized" and i love it!

reviews.headline: I could throw away all my other lippies for this collection
reviews.comments: Honestly the best formula I've ever bought. Its so worth every penny. I plan to buy more shades.

media.headline: A must have in my routine

faceoff_positive.comments:
I received the NARS Explicit Lipstick in Color Liason - 821, totally free from BzzAgent for trying out at home and providing my honest reviews in return.  This amazing lipstick is a high-end dimensional satin lipstick that delivers long-lasting comfort with vibrant, pure-color payoff and creamy, and smudge-resistant wear.  Also, It is also gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging, and the shade is super attractive.

The highlighted ingredients in this lipstick are Rosehip Seed Oil and Hyaluronic Acid, which lock in moisture, Color Sculpt Technology, which delivers intense, and dimensional color, and Luxe Comfort Complex, which hugs lips comfortably.  Moreover,  this lipstick free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. 

I have already recommended the NARS Explicit Lipstick in Color Liason - 821 to many of my friends and family and several of them have already purchased and have worn this lipstick and are absolutely happy to wear this high-end dimensional satin lipstick that delivers long-lasting comfort with vibrant, pure-color payoff and creamy, and smudge-resistant wear, which also free of parabens, formaldehydes, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, and coal tar.
faceoff_positive.headline: NARS Explicit Liaison Lipstick!

faceoff_negative.comments:
Let's talk about Pros first. 
This case is awesome. I love that it's refillable. It feels lovely in my hand and I love the magnetic top! The flat edge of the lipstick is new to me, I don't think I've even had a stick like that. It makes a great line and when I was younger it would have been amazing but now that my lips are getting thinner it was a little too wide for my top lip at my Cupid's bow.
I also loved that the was no fragrance or flavor at all. A lot of lipstick have weird scents and tastes that turn me off but this was so neutral. 
The shade was also a red that I really liked. Red can be tough with cool pale skin but I think this one was really good shade for me. 

Cons. This might just be a me problem as I'm getting older and my lips are thinner and the skin around them is changing also. I don't wear as much makeup as I used too, so I usually just put on a lip color to add a little pop. This is a little tough to put on my shrinking upper lips because of the wide flat tip, which is a bummer because I love how it glides onto my bottom lip. 
The formula goes on smoothly and feels smooth but it bleeds a lot for me. Not sure if it's the color or the formula that is making it do that. I don't usually use lip liner because I've gotten lazy so I didn't have one in red. I tried a light nude one I have so it doesn't look great.
The color sadly does not last long at all. Between the bleed and short time it lasts, it starts out red and bold but starts to look like an are a messy red popsicle a short time later. It might just be a problem with my lip/skin type etc. I really wanted to love this. I might try it in a less bold color to see if it works out better because I do like the the lipstick.
faceoff_negative.headline: Pros & Cons
